regsim

    • Interaction Terms

Getting Started

Installation

You can install regsim from github with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("altaf-ali/regsim")

Example

library(regsim)
model <- lm(mpg ~ wt + cyl, data = mtcars)
x <- list(
  wt = seq(1, 5, 0.1),
  cyl = mean(mtcars$cyl)
)

sim <- regsim(model, x)
plot(sim, ~ wt)

summary(sim)
